title: BlogPosting Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the BlogPosting credential that represents individual blog posts using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the blog post, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the blog post.

schema:headline.description: A headline for the blog post.

schema:description.description: A description or summary of the blog post.

schema:url.description: The canonical URL of the blog post.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the blog post.

schema:author.description: The author of the blog post.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the blog post.

schema:creator.description: The creator of the blog post.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the blog post was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the blog post was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the blog post was last modified.

schema:genre.description: The genre of the blog post.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the blog post.

schema:license.description: The license under which the blog post is distributed.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the blog post (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the blog post is accessible for free.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the blog post.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the blog post.

schema:articleBody.description: The actual body of the blog post.

schema:articleSection.description: The section of a site or publication to which this post belongs.

schema:pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts.

schema:pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends.

schema:pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the blog post.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the blog post.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of the Blog or Website of which this post is a part.

schema:mainEntityOfPage.description: Indicates a page for which this thing is the main entity being described.

schema:mainEntity.description: The primary entity described by this blog post.

schema:about.description: The subject matter of the blog post.

schema:sharedContent.description: A CreativeWork such as an image, video, or audio clip shared as part of this posting.

schema:commentCount.description: The number of comments on this blog post.

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the blog post.
